name: csv-to-dynamo
description: Build a serverless framework (serverless.com) deployment that creates a Lambda, an S3 bucket, and a Dynamo DB table and uploads a file to your bucket. Then, write a plugin that invokes the Lambda after the deployment, extracts data from the file in S3 and inserts that data into DynamoDB. Be creative. Show off. Make it interesting.
author: Ben Stickley
